options.content:
PM Stats Calculation Handling
IDUN Home
OSC Product Role Matrix
Microservice Repositories and Pipelines
Domain: $pmh_domain
App: $pmh_app
Pods: ${pmh_podlist}
Databases: ${pmh_datname}

panels.title: Average Request rate per endpoint for $pmh_app

panels.description: This is the sum of container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total
panels.title: Average Container CPU Throttling Percentage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_usage_seconds_total rate per container for pods $pmh_podlist.

This translates to cpu millisecond used per 1000milliseconds. 1 ms/second = 1 millicore
panels.title: Container CPU Core Usage

panels.description: This is the container_memory_working_set_bytes usage per container for pods $pmh_podlist.
panels.title: Container Memory Usage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total  per container for pods $pmh_podlist. 

This represents the amount of millisceconds per 1000 milliseconds that a container has been throttled
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling

panels.description: This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total for pods $pmh_podlist.
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling Percentage
work in progess - % CPU of container_spec_cpu_quota
work in progress - % memory of container_spec_cpu_quota

targets.expr: (count_values without() ("startTime", pm_stats_calculator_spark_calculation_end_time_number{calculation_status="FINALIZING", site="$site"} >= $__from <= $__to) + on (calculation_id) group_left() (pm_stats_calculator_spark_calculation_end_time_number{calculation_status="FINALIZING", site="$site"} - 1) - on (calculation_id) group_left() pm_stats_calculator_spark_calculation_start_time_number{site="$site"})
pm_stats_calculator_spark_calculation_end_time_number{test="test", site="$site"} # Workaround for a grafana bug (#84232)
topk(1, pm_stats_exporter_cts_avro_export{site="$site"} >= $__from <= $__to) by (id, table, start, end, instance)
pm_stats_exporter_cts_avro_export{test="test", site="$site"} # Workaround for a grafana bug (#84232)

panels.title: Total Number of Messages Written to Kafka

targets.legendFormat: Number of Tables in Execution Reports
Number of KPIs in Execution Reports

panels.title: Number of Messages Written to Kafka

targets.expr: (count_values without() ("startTime", topk(1, pm_stats_exporter_cts_avro_export{site="$site"} >= $__from <= $__to) by (id, table, start, end, instance)) + on (id, table, start, end, instance) group_left() topk(1, pm_stats_exporter_cts_avro_export{site="$site"}) by (id, table, start, end, instance) - 1) - on (id) group_left() (topk(1, pm_stats_exporter_exec_arrive{site="$site"}) by (id))
pm_stats_exporter_cts_avro_export{test="test", site="$site"} # Workaround for a grafana bug (#84232)

panels.title: Time Between Arrival of Latest Execution Report and Export
Time Taken to Process Execution Report Message
Time Between First Calculation Start and Last Calculation End

targets.expr: topk(1, sentData{site="$site", job="eric-oss-data-loader"}) by (batchId, startTime, endTime)
